name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Sal complies in acting as the ill King's envoy, attending the Aurelian coronation.
narrate;Narrator;Joined by Nako and Pikno, servants of his Majesty, they press onwards to Aurelia.
narrate;Narrator;However, their journey is not without problems.
narrate;Narrator;The envoy is heading through territory of local terror, the Rizan bandits...
speak;Sal;This path that King Sages has mapped out around the edge of Monsdor...|It seems rather unsafe...
speak;Pikno;Hmm...{br}Indeed.|He never was one for directions...|However, we are still likely to arrive in time for the ceremony.
speak;Nako;It will be lovely to see Prince Elias take the throne.|Though it makes me feel rather old, that someone so young would be crowned...
speak;Pikno;Aurelia's royal family is said to be blessed by the Goddess herself.|It would explain the fuss behind a proper ceremony.
speak;Nako;Indeed, we have to show up to maintain good standing, with both the country and religion.
speak;Sal;Well, we better keep moving, this forest is gonna be the end of me...
speak;Lentz;Ahh. A perfect night's sleep.|Now... Time to take what's mine...
speak;Bone;Er, boss. You want us to take out a village or sum'?
speak;Lentz;Do as you please, eh?|Getting your kicks is all that matters in life.
speak;Sal;Ah! A bandit outbreak?|As if this path wasn't already a pain...
speak;Aerial;Hey boss, there's a village over in the northeast.|We should probably get there before the bandits, yeah?
